title: GITMO for Migrant Kids, Trump's Twitter Whine & Bad News for NYC Subway Commuters | Melinda Gates
itunes:title: GITMO for Migrant Kids, Trump's Twitter Whine & Bad News for NYC Subway Commuters | Melinda Gates
description:
Jaboukie Young-White offers Twitter advice to President Trump, Lewis Black foresees a horrible subway experience in New York, and Melinda Gates discusses "The Moment of Lift."
